name: @flopflip/react-redux
description: A feature toggle wrapper to use LaunchDarkly with React Redux

scripts.build: cross-env run-p build:umd build:umd:min build:es build:cjs
scripts.build:umd: cross-env NODE_ENV=development BABEL_ENV=rollup rollup -c -f umd -o dist/@flopflip-react-redux.umd.js
scripts.build:umd:min: cross-env NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=rollup rollup -c -f umd -o dist/@flopflip-react-redux.umd.min.js
scripts.build:es: cross-env NODE_ENV=development BABEL_ENV=rollup rollup -c -f es -o dist/@flopflip-react-redux.es.js
scripts.build:cjs: cross-env NODE_ENV=development BABEL_ENV=rollup rollup -c -f cjs -o dist/@flopflip-react-redux.cjs.js

author: Tobias Deekens <nerd@tdeekens.name>
